name: Disc Infinity
description:
Created by Newmark Software (M James Short) and Saam Pahlavan

You find yourself stuck in a room that goes on infinitely, dodge and dash through treacherous discs in an effort to find an end to the infinity. How far will you make it?

Features:

- Infinite gameplay (it keeps going and going!)

- Randomized rooms (it's different each time you play)

- Sick power-ups (to help you get through this Disc hell)

- Global score (try to beat the best!)

CHECK OUT OUR CURRENT GAME - 

BILL HATES VIDEOGAMES

Follow us at 

@mjamesshort

@saampahlavan

Controls -

WASD or arrow keeps. Space to use powerups. ESC to quit. ENTER to toggle fullscreen or windowed mode.
